sentences.en: Jack's inconsistent argument derange us all.
sentences.cn: 杰克前后矛盾的争辩困扰了我们大家.

sentences.en: So few men were present to derange the harmony of the wilderness.
sentences.cn: 极少有人去扰乱林子里的平静.

sentences.en: To disturb the normal physical or mental health of; derange .
sentences.cn: 使生病，使失调，使错乱打乱正常的身体或智能的健康；使神经错乱。

sentences.en: Whatever you do, don't let the stress derange owe head.
sentences.cn: 但无乱咋样，无所不能让压力使得你精神错乱。

sentences.en: Whatever you do, dont let the stress derange your mind.
sentences.cn: 但无乱如何，不能让压力使得你精神错乱。

words.tran_cn: 使（精神）错乱（derange的过去分词和过去式）；扰乱

trans.tran_en: to disturb the order or arrangement of; throw into disorder; disarrange
to disturb the order or arrangement of; throw into disorder; disarrange
